summary: An Ordinance authorizing and directing the Board of Public Works to improve Twentieth Avenue West, from West Dravus Street to Gilman Avenue; Gilman Avenue, from Twentieth Avenue West to Twenty-sixth Avenue West; Twenty-sixth Avenue West, from Gilman Avenue to Twenty-fifth Avenue West; Twenty-fifth Avenue West, from Twenty-sixth Avenue West to Commodore Way; Commodore Way, from Twenty-fifth Avenue West to Twenty-seventh Avenue West; by graveling same, and appropriating money therefor, and declaring an emergency.
